lsystem.collection.csrule

Class ContextRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • lsystem.collection.csrule.ContextRule

  • public class ContextRule
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for context sensitive LSystem rules helps to decode the context elements and extracts the premis character
    Author:
    Martin Prout
